title: Ep. 139 "Let Me Borrow A Dollar" ft. Mina B.
description:
Mina B of the Mina B Podcast joins us this week for more girl talk, letting your ex borrow money, micropenises, and running scams. It's a very Atlanta episode this week lol

We're coming to Texas!
9/14- Houston
9/21- Atlanta

Tickets will be on sale on Eventbrite Friday 6/14/19. These two shows will both be extra special because we're also celebrating our birthdays!

You can also purchase merch at www.cocktalespod.com

Visit dossier.co/cocktales for a special discount on Dossier's fragrances!

Check out Mina B's podcast and the latest with her on her page @minadoll

Follow Us
